sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
determines what will happen
, obvladuje tisto, kar se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: Economic factors determine the progress which a society can make.

sense.def:
To determine the truth about something
pomeni odkriti resnico o nečem.

seg.quote: It was in the public interest to determine exactly what happened.

sense.def:
To determine something
pomeni nekaj skleniti ali urediti.

seg.quote: The date of the match is yet to be determined.
...to determine how their money should be spent.
